body: Calling it chaotic is an understatement.
The story was OK, kept me glued in between.....but near the end it seems the author just dropped a sledge hammer on the story and cut it abruptly.
This one seemed interesting but in the end, no boner and i'm questioning my one sanity right now. @Troncol I'm thinking the same thing about the whole "hentai logic" here, this is just too dumb.
I like the lack of censorship in some scenes, the art style is maybe 6/10
I was thinking the grandpa looks in great shape for someone with teen grandchildren. Then it appears he's their mom grandparent.
The story is so bad, that its funny again. :D

This was one of the dumbest things I've ever read. I couldn't take it seriously. This was like the manga equivalent to one of those really bad and cheap 80’s or 90’s porn... not the ones that are so bad they're funny [because even those still have some entertainment value], but the ones that are so bad that you just end up staring at the screen thinking "WTF?" I think I lost a few brain cells on this tank. I know hentai logic can be a bit far-fetched but... come on!
lol this shit's fucking garbage for sad autists
